data.text:
AS OF 2022 WE REMADE THIS WITH A NEW PERFECT DIGITAL HD 1080P SOURCE

WITH SELECT-ABLE ENGLISH CAPTIONS [CC] FOR THOSE WHO NEED IT

IT IS NOW A 18 DVD SET IN 3 BOXES

Sonny with a Chance is an American sitcom created by Steve Marmel which aired for two seasons on Disney Channel from February 8, 2009 to January 2, 2011. The series follows the experiences of teenager Sonny Munroe, portrayed by Demi Lovato, who becomes the newest accepted cast member of her favorite live comedy television show, So Random!.

Season 1 1. 1-1 08 Feb 09 Sketchy Beginnings 2. 1-2 08 Feb 09 West Coast Story 3. 1-3 15 Feb 09 Sonny at the Falls 4. 1-4 22 Feb 09 You've Got Fan Mail 5. 1-5 01 Mar 09 Cheater Girls 6. 1-6 08 Mar 09 Three's Not Company 7. 1-7 15 Mar 09 Poll'd Apart 8. 1-8 29 Mar 09 Fast Friends 9. 1-9 12 Apr 09 Sonny with a Chance of Dating 10. 1-10 26 Apr 09 Sonny and the Studio Brat 11. 1-11 03 May 09 Promises, Prom-Misses 12. 1-12 17 May 09 The Heartbreak Kid 13. 1-13 07 Jun 09 Battle of the Networks' Stars 14. 1-14 05 Jul 09 Prank'd 15. 1-15 02 Aug 09 Tales from the Prop House 16. 1-16 16 Aug 09 Sonny in the Kitchen with Dinner 17. 1-17 27 Sep 09 Guess Who's Coming to Guest Star 18. 1-18 01 Nov 09 Hart to Hart 19. 1-19 08 Nov 09 Sonny in the Middle 20. 1-20 15 Nov 09 Cookie Monsters 21. 1-21 22 Nov 09 Sonny: So Far Season 2 22. 2-1 14 Mar 10 Walk a Mile in My Pants 23. 2-2 21 Mar 10 Sonny Get Your Goat 24. 2-3 28 Mar 10 Gassie Passes 25. 2-4 11 Apr 10 Sonny with a Song 26. 2-5 18 Apr 10 High School Miserable 27. 2-6 02 May 10 Legend of Candy Face 28. 2-7 09 May 10 Gummy with a Chance 29. 2-8 16 May 10 Random Acts of Disrespect 30. 2-9 23 May 10 Grady with a Chance of Sonny 31. 2-10 13 Jun 10 Falling for the Falls (1) 32. 2-11 20 Jun 10 Falling for the Falls (2) 33. 2-12 18 Jul 10 Sonny with a Secret (1) 34. 2-13 18 Jul 10 Sonny with a Secret (2) 35. 2-14 08 Aug 10 The Problem with Pauly 36. 2-15 29 Aug 10 That's So Sonny 37. 2-16 19 Sep 10 Chad Without a Chance 38. 2-17 26 Sep 10 My Two Chads 39. 2-18 17 Oct 10 A So Random Halloween Special 40. 2-19 24 Oct 10 Sonny with a 100% Chance of Meddling 41. 2-20 14 Nov 10 Dakota's Revenge 42. 2-21 21 Nov 10 Sonny with a Kiss 43. 2-22 28 Nov 10 A So Random! Holiday Special 44. 2-23 05 Dec 10 Sonny with a Grant 45. 2-24 12 Dec 10 Marshall with a Chance 46. 2-25 19 Dec 10 Sonny with a Choice 47. 2-26 09 Jan 11 New Girl

When Demi Lovato left after the second season they renamed the show So Random! for season 3

So Random! is an American Disney Channel sketch comedy series that premiered on June 5, 2011.[1] It was announced as an independent series after Demi Lovato left the parent series, Sonny with a Chance.[2] The series features the actors who acted in Sonny with a Chance, besides Lovato: Tiffany Thornton, Sterling Knight, Brandon Mychal Smith, Doug Brochu, and Allisyn Ashley Arm along with other featured actors who recur in the series. The series premiere was watched by 4.1 million viewers
